languages.text: "Укрепить боевой дух экипажа, выдать дополнительный паек отличившимся в битве. Дальше будет тяжелее".
"Bolster the crew's morale. Give out additional rations to those who showed valour in battle. This is just the beginning."
languages.original_text: "Укрепить боевой дух экипажа, выдать дополнительный паек отличившимся в битве. Дальше будет тяжелее".

traits.locale_text: "Bolster the crew's fighting spirit, give an additional ration to those who showed bravery in battle. We are going to face even more hardships."
"Bolster the crew's fighting spirit, give an additional ration to those who showed bravery in battle. We are going to face even more hardships."
"Bolster the crew's morale, give out additional rations to those who showed valour in battle. This is just the beginning."
"Bolster the crew's morale, give out additional rations to those who showed valour in battle. This is just the beginning."
"Bolster the crew's morale. Give out additional rations to those who showed valour in battle. This is just the beginning."

languages.text: “鼓舞一下船员的士气，给刚刚在战斗中表现勇敢的人配发额外的口粮。这仅仅是个开始。”
languages.original_text: "Bolster the crew's morale. Give out additional rations to those who showed valour in battle. This is just the beginning."

traits.locale_text: “鼓舞一下船员的士气，给刚刚在战斗中表现勇敢的人配发额外的口粮。这仅仅是个开始。”

languages.text: « Remontez le moral des troupes et distribuez des rations supplémentaires à ceux qui ont fait preuve de bravoure. Ce n'était qu'un début. »
languages.original_text: "Bolster the crew's morale. Give out additional rations to those who showed valour in battle. This is just the beginning."

traits.locale_text: « Remontez le moral des troupes et distribuez des rations supplémentaires à ceux qui ont fait preuve de bravoure. Ce n'était qu'un début. »

languages.text: "Bestärkt die Moral der Crew und verteilt zusätzliche Rationen an alle, die Mut im Kampf bewiesen haben. Das ist erst der Anfang."
languages.original_text: "Bolster the crew's morale. Give out additional rations to those who showed valour in battle. This is just the beginning."

traits.locale_text: "Bestärkt die Moral der Crew und verteilt zusätzliche Rationen an alle, die Mut im Kampf bewiesen haben. Das ist erst der Anfang."

languages.text: «Levantemos el ánimo de los tripulantes: entregue raciones extra a los que han demostrado valor en combate. Esto es solo el comienzo».
languages.original_text: "Bolster the crew's morale. Give out additional rations to those who showed valour in battle. This is just the beginning."

traits.locale_text: «Levantemos el ánimo de los tripulantes: entregue raciones extra a los que han demostrado valor en combate. Esto es solo el comienzo».

languages.text: 「乗組員の士気を高め、戦闘で勇敢な働きをした者に追加配給をする。これはほんの始まりにすぎない」
languages.original_text: "Bolster the crew's morale. Give out additional rations to those who showed valour in battle. This is just the beginning."

traits.locale_text: 「乗組員の士気を高め、戦闘で勇敢な働きをした者に追加配給をする。これはほんの始まりにすぎない」

languages.text: "Tayfanın moralini artırın. Çatışmada yiğitlik gösterenlere ilave erzak verin. Bu daha başlangıç."
languages.original_text: "Bolster the crew's morale. Give out additional rations to those who showed valour in battle. This is just the beginning."
